title: Academic Paper
description: Read the full research paper detailing the architecture, training methodology, and results of the RiskOptimix Music Transformer.

title: GitHub Repository
description: Access the complete source code, training scripts, and model implementations. Contributions and stars are welcome!

title: Jupyter Notebooks
description: Explore interactive notebooks demonstrating model training, inference, and music analysis. Perfect for learning and experimentation.

title: Training Dataset
description: Information about the MAESTRO dataset and preprocessing pipeline used to train the model on high-quality piano performances.
